h2_title: Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong
content: You'll gain a moderate increase in the poison damage you deal, and have the added bonus of poison resistance alongside it. Even if you're not going up against too many enemies that use poison attacks, you will find plenty are susceptible to poison damage and the status will build up letting you chip away at an enemy's health bar while you use other moves.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Spirits_to_Use.md', within the main section titled 'Best Spirits to Use', specifically from the subsection 'Best Spirits to Use in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Guangmou'.
The content is as follows:
You'll gain a moderate increase in the poison damage you deal, and have the added bonus of poison resistance alongside it. Even if you're not going up against too many enemies that use poison attacks, you will find plenty are susceptible to poison damage and the status will build up letting you chip away at an enemy's health bar while you use other moves.
